data.name: Mikasa & Armin Plain clothes Outfit Early Release
data.detailed_description:
Mikasa and Armin's "Plain Clothes Outfits" are released early.
Mikasa and Armin will be available for use, and can change into their "Plain Clothes Outfits" from the Daily Life sections in "Story Mode" or in "Another Mode."

▼How to use
You can access the "Plain Clothes Outfits" by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select the character whose costume has been unlocked.
Change into the "Plain Clothes Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach the character whose costume has been unlocked in the Daily Life section.
Change into the "Plain Clothes Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near the character.

fullgame.name: Attack on Titan 2 - A.O.T.2 - 進撃の巨人２

data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 VRAM 1GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo 48kHzWAVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 VRAM 2GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48KHzWAVE
